title: 323A.0304 STATEMENT OF DENIAL.
text: A partner or other person named as a partner in a filed statement of partnership authority or in a list maintained by an agent pursuant to section 323A.0303(b), may file a statement of denial stating the name of the partnership and the fact that is being denied, which may include denial of a person's authority or status as a partner. A statement of denial is a limitation on authority as provided in section 323A.0303(d) and (e).
